sourcesContent:
<template>
  <Wrapper>
    <!-- loading组件 -->
    <AppLoading v-if="firstIn"></AppLoading>
    <!-- 消息列表项模块 -->
    <MessageItem :userLists="userLists" :maibao="maibao" :pushmsg="pushmsg"></MessageItem>
  </Wrapper>
</template>
<script>
import messageApi from '../../../api/message/index'
import AppLoading from '../../../components/AppLoading/index'
import MessageItem from '../../../components/MessageItem/index'
import Wrapper from '../../../components/Wrapper/index'
import dialogService from '../../../service/dialogService'
export default {
  name: 'message-index',
  data() {
    return {
      maibao: null, // 小脉宝消息
      pushmsg: null, // 推送消息
      userLists: [], // 用户消息列表
      popRed: false, //小红点
      firstIn: true // 第一次进入
    }
  },
  components: {
    AppLoading,
    Wrapper,
    MessageItem
  },
  async mounted() {
    Promise.all([
      messageApi.getXiaomaibao(),
      messageApi.getUserlist(),
      messageApi.getPush(1)
    ])
      .then(result => {
        if (result[0].data.list.data) {
          this.maibao = result[0].data.list.data[0]
        }
        this.popRed = result[0].data.pop_flag
        this.userLists = result[1].data.list.data
        if (result[2].data.list) {
          this.pushmsg = result[2].data.list.data[0]
        }
        this.firstIn = false
      })
      .catch(error => {
        console.log(error) // 失败了
        this.firstIn = false
      })
  },
  methods: {
    touser(id) {
      this.$router.push('/message/user?id=' + id)
    },
    async deluser(id) {
      let user = await messageApi.delUsermsg(id)
      dialogService.toast('删除成功')
    },
    touchStart(index) {
      this.tindex = index
      //tounches类数组，等于1时表示此时有只有一只手指在触摸屏幕
      if (event.touches.length == 1) {
        // 记录开始位置
        this.startX = event.touches[0].clientX
      }
    },
    touchMove(ev) {
      ev = ev || event
      //获取删除按钮的宽度，此宽度为滑块左滑的最大距离
      let wd = 155
      if (ev.touches.length == 1) {
        // 滑动时距离浏览器左侧实时距离
        this.moveX = ev.touches[0].clientX
        //起始位置减去 实时的滑动的距离，得到手指实时偏移距离
        this.disX = this.startX - this.moveX
        // 如果是向右滑动或者不滑动，不改变滑块的位置
        if (this.disX < 0 || this.disX == 0) {
          this.$set(this.transforms, this.tindex, 0)
          // 大于0，表示左滑了，此时滑块开始滑动
        } else if (this.disX > 0) {
          //具体滑动距离我取的是 手指偏移距离*5。
          this.$set(this.transforms, this.tindex, this.disX)
          // 最大也只能等于删除按钮宽度
          if (this.disX >= wd) {
            this.$set(this.transforms, this.tindex, 155)
          }
        }
      }
    },
    touchEnd(ev) {
      ev = ev || event
      let wd = 155
      if (ev.changedTouches.length == 1) {
        let endX = ev.changedTouches[0].clientX
        this.disX = this.startX - endX
        //如果距离小于删除按钮一半,强行回到起点
        if (this.disX < wd / 2) {
          this.$set(this.transforms, this.tindex, 0)
        } else {
          //大于一半 滑动到最大值
          this.$set(this.transforms, this.tindex, 155)
        }
      }
    }
  }
}
</script>
<style lang="scss" scoped>
.warpper {
  .message {
    .msgbox {
      margin-left: 30px;
      flex: 1;

      .type {
        .time {
          float: right;
          color: #6e6e6e;
          font-size: 22px;
          font-weight: normal;
        }

        overflow: hidden;
        color: #000000;
        font-size: 30px;
        /* font-weight: bold; */
        margin-bottom: 13px;
      }

      .content {
        .reddot {
          float: right;
          display: block;
          width: 20px;
          height: 20px;
          border-radius: 50%;
          border: 3px solid #fff;
          background: #ef2323;
        }

        overflow: hidden;
        position: relative;
        color: #6e6e6e;
        font-size: 24px;
      }
    }

    .icon-tongzhi,
    img {
      text-align: center;
      background: #3599f6;
      position: relative;
      width: 90px;
      height: 90px;
      display: block;
      line-height: 90px;
      color: #fff;
      border-radius: 50%;
      font-size: 40px;
    }

    transition: all 0.3s ease-in-out;
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    position: relative;
    width: 100%;
    padding: 0 30px;
    box-sizing: border-box;
    height: 140px;
    border-bottom: 1px solid #f5f5f5;

    .del {
      position: absolute;
      text-align: center;
      right: -155px;
      top: 0;
      width: 155px;
      height: 140px;
      line-height: 140px;
      font-size: 28px;
      color: #fff;
      background: #f50303;
    }
  }

  .topbar {
    .item {
      font-size: 22px;
      color: #666666;
      padding-top: 30px;
      width: 100%;
      text-align: center;

      .icon-shoucang2 {
        background: linear-gradient(to right, #fb4646, #fa4545);
      }

      .icon-woderenqi {
        background: linear-gradient(to right, #fb9635, #fb9535);
      }

      .icon-xitongxiaoxi {
        background: linear-gradient(to right, #385df9, #365cf8);
      }

      .iconfont {
        .reddot {
          position: absolute;
          display: block;
          width: 20px;
          height: 20px;
          border-radius: 50%;
          border: 3px solid #fff;
          background: #ef2323;
          top: 0;
          right: 0;
        }

        position: relative;
        width: 90px;
        height: 90px;
        display: block;
        margin: 0 auto 16px;
        line-height: 90px;
        color: #fff;
        border-radius: 50%;
        font-size: 40px;
      }
    }

    padding: 0 30px;
    height: 210px;
    width: 100%;
    box-sizing: border-box;
    overflow: hidden;
    display: flex;
    border-bottom: 20px solid #f6f6f6;
  }

  color: #000;
  width: 100%;
  box-sizing: border-box;
  min-height: 100vh;
  background: #fff;
  overflow: hidden;
  position: relative;
}
</style>
